name: blog_entry
schema:
CREATE TABLE "blog_entry" (
   [id] INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
   [title] TEXT,
   [slug] TEXT,
   [body] TEXT,
   [created] TEXT,
   [metadata] TEXT,
   [tweet_html] TEXT,
   [import_ref] TEXT,
   [extra_head_html] TEXT,
   [card_image] TEXT,
   [custom_template] TEXT,
   [series_id] TEXT REFERENCES [blog_series]([id])
)
